Sentencas: LSCM substituted on the A site of the perovskite by 10 at.% of cerium, has been synthesised and examined as a potential anode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane

Sentencas: La0.65Ce0.1Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta material, fired at 1100 degrees C in argon, exhibits a rhombohedral structure.
Titulo: Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane

Sentencas: At 1185 K and at low pO(2), its electrical conductivity is similar to that of non-substituted LSCM.
Titulo: Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane

Sentencas: Good electrochemical performance was achieved using La0.65Ce0.1Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta as anode with a polarisation resistance of 0.2 and 1.6 Omega cm(2) at 1173 K in, respectively, wet, 3% H2O hydrogen and wet methane, i.e. without using excess steam content.
Titulo: Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane

Sentencas: In particular the Ce modification enhances performance without additional microstructural modification and increases OCV in moist methane.
Titulo: Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane
Ce-substituted LSCM as new anode material for SOFC operating in dry methane
